Getting traits on command
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): Getting traits on command
By Jimeous on Wednesday, July 30, 2003 - 05:42 am:

*originally posted in the "How to hunt for passwords thread*

Brilliant Goldenboy...

Something which we've known is that some combinations of letters affect the traits

For 4 lettered words this occurs with the last 2 letters. You'll find fixed traits this way, which generally work with most combinations.

+D Adds Expert
??+D #397 Rolling 88/130/133/118/135/80 Traits: Up Shot, Expert
AA+D #207 Naga 170/109/161/109/105/121 Traits: Up Claws, Expert

+j Adds Expert
??+j #152 Ducken 89/126/87/123/130/71 Traits: Up Mind, Expert
AA+j #133 Suezo 130/139/141/74/80/86 Traits: Eagle Eye, Expert

rS Adds Success
AArS #332 Lesione 119/110/125/106/116/145 Traits: Up Water, Success
??rS #001 Pixie 70/195/108/160/70/85 Traits: SwtSmell, Up Magic, Success

,* Adds Up Wind
??,* #261 Mochroller 157/64/124/128/73/137 Traits: SoftBody, Up Wind
AA,* #077 Birdlimer 90/111/146/144/146/110 Traits: Softbody, Up Wind

y, Adds UpLtning
??y, #152 Ducken 88/113/95/143/121/69 Traits: Up Mind, UpLtning
AAy, #368 Antlan 136/93/111/92/124/110 Traits: Tuf Skin, Up Fists, UpLtning

jx Adds Up Earth
??jx #237 Kraken 123/104/155/136/68/110 Traits: Up Water, Up Earth
AAjx #007 Allure 90/190/145/150/57/94 Traits: SwtSmell, Up Claws, Up Earth

,! Adds Up Mind
??,! #425 Henger 134/112/118/125/93/93 Traits: TuffArmor, Up Mind
AA,! #183 Rock Hound 116/91/148/166/108/87 Traits: UpLtning, Rock Skin, Up Mind

As you can see in the examples, I've changed the first 2 letters

Some other combinations to try out, put 2 letters before these
yF - Adds Up Claws on some monsters
jG - Adds Up Fire
jF - Adds Up Fire
+T - Adds Up Fire
+z - Adds Up Fire
+~ - Adds Up Fire
rW - Adds TufSkin
,V - Adds Up Earth
AF - Adds Up Ice
,n - Adds Up Ice
+Y - Adds Up Ice
+b - Adds Up Ice
+4 - Adds Up Ice
+7 - Adds Up Ice
+_ - Adds Up Ice
,- - Adds Up Magic
+A - Adds Up Magic
+! - Adds Up Magic
jn - Adds Up Water

Just remember, not all combinations work, but if you're hunting for a password, why not try to get one with a desired trait :)
